content: याज्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be sacrificed. {@--2@} Sacrificial. {@--3@} One for whom a sacrifice is performed. {@--4@} One who is allowed by Śāstras to sacrifice. --ज्यः {@--1@} A sacrificer, the institutor of a sacrifice. {@--2@} The performer of a sacrifice for another. --ज्यं The presents or fee received for officiating at a sacrifice.
